sentences.en: Couples with an alcoholic husband who received behavioral marital therapy were abstinent from alcohol longer.
sentences.cn: 夫妇若是先生酗酒而接受婚姻行为治疗的戒酒维持较久.

sentences.en: During treatment, sexual activity should be abstinent.
sentences.cn: 治疗期间, 宜节制房事.

sentences.en: Indeed, very many females and males are neither abstinent nor sexually exclusive.
sentences.cn: 真实的情形是, 非常多的男男女女既不禁欲也不性专一.

sentences.en: Some people are able to remain sexually abstinent and thus escape all risks .
sentences.cn: 一些人在性的方面能够坚持禁欲并且由此规避所有的风险。

sentences.en: Some people are able to remain sexually abstinent and thus escape all risks.
sentences.cn: 一些人在性的方面能够坚持禁欲并且由此规避所有的风险.

words.tran_cn: 禁欲的；有节制的；饮食有度的

trans.tran_cn: 饮食有度的，有节制的，禁欲的
